entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
